services.title: Fullstack Web Development
services.description: I build robust, responsive web applications using modern frameworks (React, Node.js, Express, Django) and databases (MySQL, MongoDB). From UI/UX to server-side logic, I handle the full stack.

services.title: System Administration & DevOps
services.description: Managing servers, deployments, and automation. I configure Linux/Windows systems, optimize performance, and implement CI/CD pipelines for smooth development workflows.
